entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
